LanguageData.GeneticPurityErrorDesc: There has been an error when trying to initialize the genetic purity gene. The error is most likely due to a xenotype being removed and still being present in the config file. Please open the mod settings for the Foxian race to reset the values set on xenotype A or B. In the meantime, the erroneous values have been set to only Foxians or greater Foxians until the config for the mod has been opened and the error resolved.
LanguageData.CursedSwordBerseker: {0_nameDef} has tried unequipping his weapon. But in doing so, he awoke the ire of the spirit inhabiting his sword, and {0_nameDef}'s mind temporarily broke as a result of the spirit's retaliation.
LanguageData.FoxianModSettingsWarning: Changing any values might require a restart or reloading a save !
LanguageData.FoxianInformation: You can get more information on each setting by hovering your mouse on the label.
LanguageData.PsychicManipulationSettingsDesc: This number means you gain a bonus social skill point for every x% psychic sensitivity beyond 100%. Each pawn has a basic value of 100% psychic sensitivity (unless they have traits or genes that change the default value).\nBy default, the value of the threshold is 25%, so a pawn with 150% psychic sensitivity will gain 2 bonus social skills points.
LanguageData.PsychicManipulationSettingSkillsDropDown: The skill shown in the button will be the one to receive the bonus skill points for the gene.
LanguageData.AnimalConnectionSettingsDesc: This threshold represents how much psychic sensitivity a pawn needs to trigger the effect of "Animal Connection". By default, the value is set to 150%. Setting that value to 0% will deactivate the trigger.
LanguageData.GeneticPurityFoxianTrigger: Should a person be a Foxian to trigger the genetic purity gene ?
LanguageData.GeneticPurityFoxianTriggerDesc: By default, only a Foxian or a person considered "Foxian enough" can birth an offspring with xenotype A or B. Otherwise, they will transmit all their genes to the offspring. By deactivating this condition, everyone with this gene would be able to birth Xenotype A or B, whetever they are Foxian or not.
LanguageData.GeneticPuritySettingXenotypeADesc: The xenotype shown in the button will be the one used for creating an offspring with xenotype A. By default, xenotype A is set to the Foxian xenotype.
LanguageData.GeneticPuritySettingXenotypeBDesc: The xenotype shown in the button will be the one used for creating an offspring with xenotype B. By default, xenotype B is set to the Greater Foxian xenotype.
